kv:
Mystery awaits for you in the deep jungle!
The International Committee welcomes you to join us on the 5h of November, in jungle seized Smökki for a Mystery Dinner. During the evening you are going to be served a dinner while solving puzzles in this escape room styled event. Are you capable to solve mysteries of the jungle?
This event is open for all students of Aalto, and it will be held completely in English.

What?: Jungle themed mystery dinner
When?: 18:00, 5.11.2019
Where?: Smökki
